attributes.action: Boris Johnson should be impeached for breaking the law and lying to the Queen
attributes.additional_details:
Brexit: What just happened in the UK Supreme Court?

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-49807212
attributes.background: When the supreme court unanimously finds that you broke the law whilst doing your job, there isn’t an employer in the land that would allow you to continue in your role. When you are the Prime Minister, the beacon of trust and integrity for our country these actions are simply inexcusable.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for someone to lose their job.
